plot: A young girl witnesses the death of her brother by her father, distraught and tired, the girl faints in front of a restaurant where a Kung Fu master lives.
title: Samurai Diablo
plot_es: A young girl witnesses the death of her brother by her father, distraught and tired, the girl faints in front of a restaurant where a Kung Fu master lives.
